definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sentences.chinese: 咬合閥蓋保護閥遠離灰塵和碎片，包括內置咬氣門芯。

sentences.english: Could use bore scope for visual inspection of valves, chambers, cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用氣缸內窺儀檢查氣門，氣缸，燃燒室。

sentences.english: The intake swirl in the cylinder was induced by a swirler which was fixed in one of two intake ports.
sentences.chinese: 採用在進氣門上方安裝旋流器的方法產生進氣渦流。

sentences.english: Major production and distribution piston rings and valve seat.
sentences.chinese: 主要生產和經銷活塞環及氣門座圈。

sentences.english: The results indicate that the reject rate of the tire valve semifinished products are descended.
sentences.chinese: 表明所生產的氣門毛坯廢品率明顯下降。

sentences.english: The wire harness circuits for the heater-A/C control or the blend air door actuator.
sentences.chinese: 空調暖氣控制或混氣門引動器線束電路。

sentences.english: The carburetor obtains this enrichment by the addition of a choke valve in the carburetor throat above the venture and main nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 所以在節氣門和主噴管的上方增加了一個阻風門。

sentences.english: Three types and their properties of gas valves of electronic control automobile engine are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了電控發動機節氣門體的三種類型及特點。

sentences.english: The downward-moving side of the rocker arm pushes on the valve stem to open the valve.
sentences.chinese: 搖臂向下移動的那一邊推動氣門杆以打開氣門。

sentences.english: The downward-moving side of the rocker arm pushes on the valve stem to open the valve.
sentences.chinese: 搖臂向下移動的那一邊推動氣門杆以打開氣門。

sentences.english: The principles and applications of adjusting valve clearance by four-step method are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了發動機氣門間隙四次調整法的原理與應用實例。

sentences.english: Valve overlap is held to a minimum on turbo-charged engines.
sentences.chinese: 在渦輪增壓發起機上氣門堆疊角被連結在一個最小值。

sentences.english: Can you install an inner tube air nozzle?
sentences.chinese: 能不能裝一個氣門芯兒？

sentences.english: Grinding valves would require several more hours.
sentences.chinese: 磨削氣門則需要更多的時間。

sentences.english: On the basis of these hints, a 4-valve diesel engine intake port model is explored.
sentences.chinese: 並據此設計開發了某四氣門柴油機迸氣道的模型。

sentences.english: These openings are part of tubes called trachea.

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
